teian:general-error-messages.teian:selection-empty: In order to annotate, you must select something.
teian:general-error-messages.teian:selection-non-empty: In order to annotate, you must NOT select text!
teian:general-error-messages.teian:forbidden-overlapping: You are not allowed to overlap these XLIFF elements!
teian:general-error-messages.teian:warnOnSelectingSearchResult: In order to annotate, you must select one search result!
teian:general-error-messages.teian:warnOnRemovingRootEntity: You are not allowed to remove the root entity!
teian:general-error-messages.teian:warnOnSplittingElement: You are not allowed to insert this entity here!
